data.name: Klomanager - Regurgitated
data.detailed_description:
If toilets are your passion, you have come to the right game. If not, you still might have a lot of fun with this economic simulation filled with crazy ideas and characters. Build up your toilet empire and research equipment to increase the attraction of your toilets. To deal with the competition you can send pukers and destroyers on sinister missions. Or ruin their reputation by using gossipers who spread malicious rumours about the state of your opponents' toilets.

Features:

  • Get dirty rich with other peoples needs
  • Research 24 cutting edge toilet technologies
  • Equip your toilets and expand your toiletitarian system
  • Sabotage against your opponents with pukers, destroyers and gossipers
  • Use the sanitary board to strike fear in the hearts of your opponents
  • Improve the reputation of your toilets with advertising campaigns
  • Explore seven different goals with multiple settings
  • Random events and tempests add variation to each match
  • Play on different maps
  • Up to three AI or human opponents (hot seat game or Steam Remote Play)
  • Get all game intern achievements

data.short_description: Klomanager - Regurgitated is a turn-based economic simulation that deals with the world of toilets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
